tool_description: Validates customer answers to security questions and determines verification success.

question_ids.description: Array of question identifiers being answered

answers.description: Array of customer answers corresponding to question_ids

case_sensitive.description: Whether answer validation is case sensitive

partial_match.description: Allow partial string matches for answers

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: question_ids and answers arrays must have same length.
Invalid question IDs: One or more question IDs not found or expired.
Empty answers: All answer fields must contain non-empty responses.
Account mismatch: Provided account_id doesn't match question session.
Validation timeout: Security questions have expired, generate new ones.
usage: Provide question_ids from Security Question Generator and corresponding customer answers. Set case_sensitive and partial_match based on business rules.

overall_result.description: Overall validation result: passed, failed, or partial
